channel.description: Recent content in RNAseq on Monash Bioinformatics Platform

item.title: Integration of miR-196 and retinoic acid signaling in limb development
item.description: Integration of miR-196 and retinoic acid signaling in limb development and patterning Retinoic acid signaling can be inhibited with a drug treatment

item.title: A suite of Bioinformatics tools to call and explore time-course mutations from RNA-Seq
item.description: RNA Sequencing allows researchers to study the cancer genome from different perspectives than just differential expression analyses

item.title: 3D Cardiomics: Unravelling the spatial transcriptome of the heart
item.description: An understanding of spatial gene expression and regulation is key to uncovering developmental and physiological processes, and accordingly, disease processes
